description: This file defines a data class 'StoredCartLine' which represents a minimal persisted model of a shopping cart line item. It includes fields for item details, options, and identifiers, facilitating storage and restoration of cart state without backend dependency.

classes.name: StoredCartLine
classes.description: A data class representing a minimal persisted shopping cart line item, containing item details, options, and identifiers necessary for UI restoration and total calculations.
